name: Super Robot Wars X
overview: The fate of war gods crosses in a new world (X-cross-) Robots meet together across the boundaries of works on a different world “Al Worth”, Super Robot Wars X Appears on Nintendo Switch! What is waiting for the war gods who are led by the strange fate and gather in “Al Worth” …? Witness the battle unfolding in the world of illusion. The Nintendo Switch version includes 20 episodes of bonus scenarios distributed on other models!
